text: My name is Rudi. I am a full-stack JavaScript engineer specializing in React, Node.js, functional programming and serverless paradigms. I enjoy hacking on the latest tech and being automating workflows and processes. I am also passionate about mentoring, education and personal development in the workplace. I started Fresh Rudix Labs 2010 under which I do development and consulting work, and I am actively involved in various other startups. When Iâ€™m not working, you can find me reading good books, watching great movies, geeking out over all things Star Wars.
